moves.name: Covet
moves.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Low Kick
moves.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier targets.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Punishment
moves.description: This attack's power increases the more the target has powered up with stat changes.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user's HP.
